content: **this pattern is part of the winter 2025 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **sizes** 1 2 3 **measurements** to fit approx head circumference 48 54 59 cm / 19 21¼ 23¼ **materials** pom pom x hobbii garland shade tadpole 12 2 balls **needles** 4 5mm / us 7 circular needle 40cm / 16 length 4 5mm / us 7 needles suitable for working small circumferences in the round always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **yarn quality** garland hobbii x pom pom worsted weight 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g **gauge** 22 sts & 30 row = 10cm / 4 over 2/2 rib on 4 5mm needles after blocking **pattern information** the gumnut hat is worked in the round from the brim up **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3
